item.title: Do You Know Who You Are?
item.description:
Do You Know Who You Are? by undefined Dean R. Burgess, First Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Evening of 178th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2008
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Dean R. Burgess, First Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency
